reviews.text: Nice and tasty and I think I can actually taste all the individual flavors for the first time.
Love this vape and almost through 60mls of it after steeping 2 weeks.  I agree with Duder that a sweeter coconut could be used but excellent recipe as it stands!

Very tasty, I was able to taste a slight floral in the coconut but its mostly undetectable. It is a perfect balance of sweetness and very light and fluffy. Overall very good and really enjoyed at after mixing...stills needs to steep but not sure it will make it. Great Job.

I let this age for about 2 weeks to give the custard time to develop, I also used TFA Sweetener instead of EM. Regardless I feel FA Coconut is a very real coconut flavor and it may need to be used with a sweeter coconut...TFA coconut candy, FLV Sweet Coconut maybe. It's still a good recipe that deserves a taste.
